item.title: Flickering street light, 14th September
item.description:
The street light outside the house called Tintagel on Western Road is flickering and strobing. We live opposite and it is disturbing us at night, beginning to make us feel ill. Please can you fix the lamp?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Western Road, Lansdown, Cheltenham
